during_your_stay_house_rule: Treat the place like your own.
family_amenities: Pack ’n play/Travel crib – available upon request
Standalone high chair – available upon request
place_description: Use our newly renovated place as your basecamp for your North Vancouver adventures. Located in Blueridge at the foot of Mt Seymour, close to world class mtb/hiking trails,  Deep Cove, and 25min to Vancouver, our 1BR garden level suite is ideal for nature lovers, professionals, and young families.  Fully equipped kitchen, office nook, queen bed and queen size pull-out couch, washer & dryer, outside patio overlooking the "evergreen" backyard. Bolt-in bike rack on covered patio to store bikes.
the_space_description:
You'll find your own private entrance at the back of the house, with keyless entry and a patio for you to use.

The suite includes a full-size kitchen with new stainless steel fridge, oven, dishwasher, microwave, and Nespresso machine (a French press is also available). You'll find a toaster, water boiler, and all the cooking and dining utensils available to prepare and enjoy your meals.

The cozy main living space comes with an expandable dining table, four chairs, a sofa bed that doubles as a queen size bed and a lounge chair to chill.

In the bedroom you will find a comfortable queen size bed, a wardrobe, as well as a dedicated office space with a desk. In addition there is a smart TV with Netflix access for your entertainment.

The bathroom includes a shower and (optional) Bidet style toilet. Outside the bathroom, you'll find a new washer and dryer for you to use.

The patio looks over the backyard with lots of trees and old tree stumps and includes a little table and four chairs to relax outside. You can also find a bolted bike stand there.
guest_access_description: You have a private entrance to the suite with a coded non-key entrance, and a covered patio. The backyard is for us to use.
other_things_to_note_description:
We live in the floor above the suite with our two small girls (4 and 6). Although we did soundproof the place through the renovation, you will hear them running around upstairs. They are normally in bed between 9pm and 6am. They might be running around the backyard in the summer, and use the trampoline as well. If you are looking for a very quiet place, our suite might not be the right place.

We love mountain biking, skiing, and pretty much most outdoor sports. We came here and stayed because of the lifestyle and happily share our knowledge and provide any tips or what to do/
